ygData.subject: The Ark rebuilding begins

Subject: The Ark rebuilding begins
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

 Magnus looked down. He showed now change in emotion. "Thank you. Please I 
need you to help me gather the tools we will need. That goes for the rest of 
you. If you could send one of your bots from each faction and try to get us 
some supplies we will need. This will take a while."
 Destructor turned to the horesmen known as famine.."Go and bring back what 
supplies Kit Kat can spare. Also update her on our siruation. Also get hold 
of Sphink so he ,may lend a hand also."
 Famine took of in the direction of the Pred base.
